DOC.brief_summary: Psychological stress is an independent cardiovascular risk factor. Activation of platelets plays an important role in atherosclerosis development and it could one of the mechanisms linking psychological stress and cardiovascular diseases
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Mental Stress on Platelet Function in Healthy Subject
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy subjects No smokers Written informed consent Exclusion criteria: Smoking Alcohol or Drug Abuse Pregnancy Use of benzodiazepins, Aspirin or NSAIDs in the last week before inclusion Participation to another study within the last month
